summary: his mod series aims to make Nordic Ruins what they should have been in vanilla Skyrim. No longer will it be like a home where lights have burned for 10000 years. No hand me down Draugr enemies. This mod series adds more fog, less lighting, and more Draugr.
descriptionHtml:
This mod series aims to make Nordic Ruins what they should have been in vanilla Skyrim. No longer will it be like a home where lights have burned for 10000 years. No hand me down Draugr enemies. This mod series adds more fog, less lighting, and more Draugr. From location to location I may also add a little thing or area. If you have never played Skyrim or if you have torn through these ruins before you should definitely get this and start a new character! This mod has been Tes5Edit cleaned and is compatible with any mod as long as the mod in question does not edit the Nord Ruins interior cells. Also this mod can be put anywhere in your load order. 

UPDATE 5

Forsaken Cave is now available. Video in works

UPDATE 4

Yngol Barrows is out! Video is out

UPDATE 3

A patch for Bleak Falls Barrow has been uploaded. All it does is fix the orange hued fog in the last room of Bleak Falls Temple cell. (Was some pesky dust rays) This file is optional


UPDATE 2

Dust Mans Cairn is out! Go to my YouTube channel or look in the video section on this page to see a play through.


I highly recommend using Sounds of Skyrim The Dungeons

Steam Link = http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9106 

Nexus Link = http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8601/?
author: Thadius Faran
